text: The Centre for Distance Education of Bharathidasan University has launched an online system for submission of examination applications from April 2016 exams onwards. V.M. Muthukumar, Vice-Chancellor of the university, launched the facility on Wednesday in the presence of C. Thiruchelvam, Registrar, P.K. Manoharan, Director, Centre of Distance Education (CDE), and R. Thirumurugan, Controller of Exams (in-charge), and Dr. Muthukumar said the CDE had introduced online facility for downloading hall tickets which had benefited more than 10,000 students. The university had planned to create online facility for admission of students to all the CDE programmes from 2016-2017 academic year onwards, he said.
title: Online forms for examinations
